summary: Habit tracking app where habits are not loading correctly in the latest draft build.
known_issues: Habits not loading in the latest draft (Version 12)

existing_features.title: Fix the habits data fetching so that habits load correctly on the HabitsPage. Investigate and resolve any broken query, actor initialization, or data-fetching issue in useQueries.ts or HabitList.tsx that prevents habits from appearing in the latest build.
